task.title: Create a PIN
task.shortdesc: All library cardholders must create a PIN.

image.alt: Image: There are two fields where you are required to enter a PIN, highlighted in this screenshot

step.cmd: Enter a combination of 4 numbers to serve as your PIN.

info.note: No special characters or letters should be used.

step.cmd: Re-enter the exact same combination of letters and numbers

info.note: if the two PINs do not match, you will not be able to submit the form.
